Hi there. About ModernGraphs.jl, it is my fault. I sometimes register dependencies just after generation and fill it during the 3 days of wait.
Here I realized that ModernGraphs.jl can share a part of it's basic code with another (registered and not empty...) package. So I delayed my input in ModernGraphs.jl.
For information ModernGraphs.jl is based on <https://github.com/Azzaare/ModernGraphs.cpp|https://github.com/Azzaare/ModernGraphs.cpp>, another package of mine.
Sorry for the inconvenience.
